Annotator

Class EntrezGeneDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • Annotator.EntrezGeneDAO

  • public class EntrezGeneDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to wrap the functionality of Entrez Gene E-Utilities, primarily search and fetch. Search and summary results are cached locally for faster retrieval. See EntrezGeneDAOExample for generic uses of this class.
    Version:
    0.3
    Author:
    Collin McCormack (cmccorma)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntrezGeneDAO()
      Creates a new EntrezGene object (creates new caches).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean search(java.lang.String queryTerms)
      Uses the Entrez Gene web service to search the database using the contents of queryTerms.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntrezGeneDAO

        public EntrezGeneDAO()
        Creates a new EntrezGene object (creates new caches).

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public boolean search(java.lang.String queryTerms)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Uses the Entrez Gene web service to search the database using the contents of queryTerms. By default, returns 20 results.
        The result can be plugged right into 'fetch' to get Entity's
        Search results are cached by url.
        Parameters:
        queryTerms - a String query
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of EntrezGene UID's, empty ArrayList on error
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
